Job Description: - Strong C, C and OOPS programming skills   - Requirement analysis, Design and development of technical solutions as per the specification/design.   - Atleast 1 year of industry experience with device driver programming   - Atleast 1 year of industry experience with software interface programming to hardware devices   - Technical expertise with Operating system concepts and multi threaded programming   - Image processing knowledge is an added skill   - Experience with Memory mapped I/O to FPGA programming is an added skill   - Co-ordination and review with project stakeholders   - 2 to 6 years of experience in large scale object oriented, distributed embedded/firmware software development   - Excellent communication skills (past experience of communicating with customers is desirable)
